title: PII Detection and Masking
description: Browser extension that detects the presence of PII embedded in the document and alerting the user to mask/remove it.

title: Police Performance and Resource Management
description: This is an analytical dashboard to monitor the police performance and manage the man power by auto allocation of duty roasters and other resources efficiently.

title: Pharma Finder
description: App that helps the people to check the availability of target medicines in their nearest pharmacies by allowing users to scan and upload their prescribtion

title: Remote Workforce Monitoring Tool
description: Application that tracks the performance of all employees and generates reports and customised suggestions. Performance is tracked in the form of browser extension.

title: Travel Stories
description: This is a travel and tourism app made to ease the flow of planning your trips and booking accomodations & transportation to explore your dream destinations
